DOC.brief_summary: The aim study 1 ) To assess prevalence tobacco use cessation treatment preference among YKHC employee , 2 ) To assess employee 's current level perceive stress , engagement physical activity , feeling resiliency inform future tobacco cessation intervention , examine relationship factor tobacco use , 3 ) To assess YKHC employee ' perception opinion hospital 's current workplace tobacco policy expansion regulation YKHC property .
DOC.detailed_description: All employee YKHC invite complete online survey take approximately 10-15 minute complete . All employee receive information via email , include overview project , information regard privacy consent , link survey . Those wish able print copy information reference . Employees wish participate click survey link . Those wish participate could simply delete email . Participants give two week complete online survey . Individuals respond within first week , send automate email reminder . All employee participate receive small incentive ( approximately $ 10 value ) .
DOC.criteria: YKHC employee age 18 year old provide consent
